title: New Enve Straight Pull Hubs Drop Weight, Add Massive Innerdrive Ratchets
content:
Enve's new hubs are said to be 60g lighter, 10 percent stiffer, and offer up to 3.6 degrees of engagement.

Read the full article at New Enve Straight Pull Hubs Drop Weight, Add Massive Innerdrive Ratchets on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
